meanings: melancholy, gloom, mental depression, low spirits, heaviness of mind.
울적하다 melancholy, gloomy, dejected, out of [in low] spirits.

vlive.korean: 기분이 조금 울적할 때 많이 들어요. I listen to it a lot when I feel a little gloomy. 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : LAST NIGHT OF YELLOW
vlive.english: I listen to it a lot when I feel a little gloomy.
